name: Null Pain
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
The touched creature has their sense of pain deadened for the duration. When they would take damage, write down the amount of damage they would take and then prevent the damage. The target automatically succeeds on all Constitution saving throws for the duration as well, and is immune to the poisoned condition.

When the spell ends, apply all damage prevented to the target creature.
empower: Removes the AP cost on this spell.
